All rights reserved.", "@odata.context": "/redfish/v1/$metadata#Systems/Members/1/Dimm/$entity", "@odata.id": "/redfish/v1/Systems/4/Dimm/2", "@odata.type": "#Dimm.v1_0_0.Dimm", "Name": "NVDIMM", "Id": "2", "DimmUID": 2, "DimmType": "NVDIMM-N", "DimmDeviceType": "DDR4", "BaseModuleType": "LRDIMM", "DimmMedia": [ "DRAM", "NAND" ], "CapacityMiB": 16384, "DataWidthBits": 64, "BusWidthBits": 72, "Manufacturer": "Contoso", "SerialNumber": "1A2B3C", "PartNumber": "1A2B3D", "AllowedSpeedsMhz": [ 2133, 2400, 2667 ], "FirmwareRevision": "RevAbc", "FirmwareApiVersion": "ApiAbc", "FunctionClasses": [ "Volatile", "Byte Accessible Persistent" ], "VendorID": "vendorX", "DeviceID": "deviceX", "SubsystemVendorID": "vendorA", "SubsystemDeviceID": "deviceA", "MaxTDPMilliWatts": [ 10000, 12000, 15000 ], "SecurityCapabilities": { "PassphraseCapable": true, "MaxPassphraseRegionCount": 4, "SecurityStates": [ "enabled", "unlocked" ] }, "SpareDeviceCount": 1, "RankCount": 1,
"DeviceLocator": "PROC 1 DIMM 2",
"DimmLocation": { "Socket": 1, "MemoryController": 1, "Channel": 2, "Slot": 1 }, "ErrorCorrection": "MultiBitECC",
"Status": { "State": "Enabled", "Health": "OK" },
"OperatingSpeedMhz": 2400,
"VolatileRegionSizeLimitMiB": 8192, "PersistentRegionSizeLimitMiB": 8192,
"Regions": [{ "RegionId": "1", "MemoryType": "Volatile", "OffsetMiB": 0, "SizeMiB": 4096, "PassphraseState": "Disabled" }, { "RegionId": "2", "MemoryType": "Volatile", "OffsetMiB": 4096, "SizeMiB": 4096, "PassphraseState": "Disabled" }, { "RegionId": "3", "MemoryType": "Byte Accessible Persistent", "OffsetMiB": 8192, "SizeMiB": 4096, "PassphraseState": "Enabled" }, { "RegionId": "4", "MemoryType": "Byte Accessible Persistent", "OffsetMiB": 12288, "SizeMiB": 4096, "PassphraseState": "Enabled" }],
"OperatingMemoryModes": [ "Volatile", "PMEM" ],
"PowerManagementPolicy": { "PolicyEnabled": true, "MaxTDPMilliWatts": 15000, "PeakPowerBudgetMilliWatts": 10000, "AveragePowerBudgetMilliWatts": 5000 }, "IsSpareDeviceEnabled": true, "IsRankSpareEnabled": false, "Metrics": { "@odata.id": "/redfish/v1/Systems/4/Dimm/2/Metrics" }, "Actions": { "#Dimm.UnlockUnit": { "target": "/redfish/v1/Systems/4/Dimm/2/Actions/Dimm.UnlockUnit", "RegionId@Redfish.AllowableValues": [ "1", "2", "3", "4" ], "Passphrase@Redfish.AllowableValues": "string" }, "#Dimm.SecureEraseUnit": { "target": "/redfish/v1/Systems/4/Dimm/2/Actions/Dimm.SecureEraseUnit", "RegionId@Redfish.AllowableValues": [ "1", "2", "3", "4" ], "Passphrase@Redfish.AllowableValues": "string" }, "#Dimm.SetPassphrase": { "target": "/redfish/v1/Systems/4/Dimm/2/Actions/Dimm.SetPassphrase", "RegionId@Redfish.AllowableValues": [ "1", "2", "3", "4" ], "Passphrase@Redfish.AllowableValues": "string" }, "#Dimm.DisablePassphrase": { "target": "/redfish/v1/Systems/4/Dimm/2/Actions/Dimm.DisablePassphrase", "RegionId@Redfish.AllowableValues": [ "1", "2", "3", "4" ], "Passphrase@Redfish.AllowableValues": "string" }, "Oem": {} }, "Oem": {} }

Annotation.String: This is the schema definition of a DIMMs and its configuration.
This sets the CurrentPeriod object values to zero.
This action shall set the CurrentPeriod object property values to zero.
Block size in bytes
The value of this property shall be the block size in bytes of all stucture elements.
This object describes the central memory of the system in general detail.
This object shall contain properties which describe the CurrentPeriod metrics for the current resource.
This object describes the central memory of the system in general detail.
This object shall contain properties which describe the LifeTime metrics for the current resource.
This object describes the central memory of the system in general detail.
This object shall contain properties which describe the HealthData metrics for the current resource.
The Actions object contains the available custom actions on this resource.
Number of blocks read since reset
The value of this property shall be number of blocks read since reset.
Number of blocks written since reset
The value of this property shall be mumber of blocks written since reset.
This object contains the DIMM metrics since last reset or ClearCurrentPeriod action.
Number of blocks read for the lifetime of the DIMM
The value of this property shall be number of blocks read for the lifetime of the DIMM.
Number of blocks written for the lifetime of the DIMM
The value of this property shall be number of blocks written for the lifetime of the DIMM.
This objects contains the DIMM metrics for the lifetime of the DIMM.
Remaining spare blocks in percentage
The value of this property shall be the remaining spare blocks in percentage.
Status of last shutdown
The value of this property shall be status of last shutdown, with true indicating success.
Data loss detection status
The value of this property shall be data loss detection status, with true indicating data loss detected.
Performance degraded mode status
The value of this property shall be verformance degraded mode status, with true indicating perfomance degraded.
Temperature threshold crossing alarm trip detected status
The value of this property shall be true if a temperature threshold alarm trip was detected.
Spare block capacity crossing alarm trip detected status
The value of this property shall be true if the spare block capacity crossing alarm trip was detected.
NUncorrectable error threshold crossing alarm trip detected status
The value of this property shall be true if the uncorrectable error threshold alarm trip was detected.
Correctable error threshold crossing alarm trip detected status
The value of this property shall be true if the correctable error threshold crossing alarm trip was detected.
